channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Mittens & Pants
channel.desc: Blueberry, Kibble Corners' Earth Day Ambassador, hopes to make a community garden for all of Kibble Corners to enjoy.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington accepts an inventor's award for Simi when she's too shy to step up, but she feels jealous and sad.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Gary's Magic Fort
channel.desc: With his favorite sweater in the wash, Gary refuses to participate in the cool science experiments his friends are doing; Gary learns that having favorite things doesn't make or break the fun.

channel.title: Molly of Denali
channel.desc: Molly and Tooey are confused when Trini refuses to join the basketball team because of polar bears.

channel.desc: Sleepy Stu enjoys waking up early.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Jeremy and Jazzy
channel.desc: Jeremy talks about his favorite bug.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Kingdom Force
channel.desc: Kingdom Force heads out to save the trapped news team and professor Dunbit in an ancient ruin but end up grappling with a protective, sentient Rock Monster along the way.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Future History
channel.desc: Kris visits the Haudenosaunee Longhouses in an interactive museum; Sarain tackles the Cup and Saucer Trail on Manitoulin Island; Kris and Sarain meet software developer Monica Peters.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Future History
channel.desc: Kris learns about the ancient practice of pictographs; Sarain heads to North Bay to visit with K'Tigaaning midwives; Kris and Sarain join writer/podcaster Ryan McMahon in studio to learn about digital storytelling.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: BC Today
channel.desc: The show where British Columbians connect on issues facing their lives and their community.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Jules Hudson joins a couple in their search for the perfect retirement retreat in the Cornish countryside.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: George awaits Eileen's answer, and Lou reveals that Mick pleaded not guilty in court.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Son of a Critch
channel.desc: Mark tries to fake being healthy after falling ill the day he is supposed to meet the Pope; a rival radio station tries to tempt Mike Jr. away from VOCM, breaking Mike Sr.'s heart.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Jamie & Jimmy's Food Fight Club
channel.desc: Saoirse Ronan joins the boys to cook a nostalgic Chinese meal she used to have as a child; Jamie and Jimmy embrace their inner Willy Wonka.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Murdoch Mysteries
channel.desc: Julia and Emily go to a bachelorette party; Murdoch and the boys get involved in a high stakes curling match.
